item.title: General concerns about coliving life
item.dc:creator: root
item.description:
1. What if i had a quarel with my roomates? If you have a quarrel with your roommates, it is important to communicate your concerns and feelings in a respectful and productive manner. You should try to discuss the issues with your roommates and come to a compromise. If the situation is not resolved, you …

item.title: 7 benefits of coliving
item.dc:creator: root
item.description:
Coliving life gains popularity in recent years. We found 7 benefits to convince you to join us in the coliving life. 1. Cost savings – Living in a coliving space is often more cost-effective than renting a traditional apartment, allowing people to save money that can be put towards other things. 2.
